monster.name: Insane Necromancer
legendaryHeader: The insane necromancer commands a small horde of the undead. If encountered amongst their horde, the necromancer has access to the following legendary actions:

legendary.name: Servant Self-Sacrifice
entries: When the necromancer is hit by an attack, they can use their reaction to telepathically order an undead creature under their command that is within 5 ft to take the blow instead.
